title: System to generate preview images of land parcels
body:
Should the following Tier 3: $1000-$2000 USD grant in the Content Creator category be approved?

## Abstract

Generate images of parcels from top, lateral and isometric perspectives.
This could run periodically on the world and images could be used in the marketplace, governance and community's made dapps.


## Grant size

20,000 MANA

## Description

I will hire a developer to help me. I will manage the process.


## Specification

fork the client to: move the player, wait for the scene to load, set the camera, take a snapshot, repeat.


## Personnel

Myself and a developer I'm going to hire.


## Roadmap and milestones

Two months of work. I have a prototype running but I need to polish it up to make a it a service that runs on the cloud.


**[Vote on this proposal on the Decentraland DAO](https://governance.decentraland.io/en/proposal?id=4a7c7c10-b8ac-11eb-8694-c7107153b63a)**
author: 0x2Ba0352480bd1Ea073A83e6639b06362131894CE
